W15_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W15_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: A world choked by smog awaited you on the other side of the door. Could the Vermilion Bird be the source of the smog?

W15_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W15_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: You've found your cat. Time to head back to Miyako City.
